subject: remove %abi macro and version checking

remove %abi macro and version checking

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

Yes, I suppose this makes sense, since we don't have an ncurses6 package or anything like that, where the conditional statements would actually have an effect...

I'm still concerned about the change to librpm-tizen that broke this package (see the bug at https://bugs.tizen.org/jira/browse/DEVT-89), but interested parties can follow up on JIRA.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
